result.eng: The Nazis didn't stop with Poland  and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.

result.ponchtml: Níor stop na Naitsiṫe leis an bPolainn agus níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ acu ċoṁ maiṫThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: All the children started laughing and couldn't stop.
result.ga: Fágadh iomlán na bpáistí sioctha leis na gáirí
result.orig: Fágadh iomlán na bpáistí sioctha leis na gáirí
result.html: Fágadh iomlán na bpáistí sioctha leis na gáiríAll the children started laughing and couldn't stop.
result.ponchtml: Fágaḋ iomlán na bpáistí siocṫa leis na gáiríAll the children started laughing and couldn't stop.

result.eng: At that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.
result.ga: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar air
result.orig: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar air
result.html: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar airAt that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.
result.ponchtml: Leis sin isteaċ le fear an tí agus cuma scaollṁar airAt that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.

result.eng: Whose boy is that?
result.ga: Cé leis an gasúr
result.orig: Cé leis an gasúr
result.html: Cé leis an gasúrWhose boy is that?
result.ponchtml: Cé leis an gasúrWhose boy is that?

result.eng: He was so short of sense as a child five years younger than him.
result.ga: Bhí sé chomh gann i gcéill leis an leanbh a bhí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná é
result.orig: Bhí sé chomh gann i gcéill leis an leanbh a bhí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná é
result.html: Bhí sé chomh gann i gcéill leis an leanbh a bhí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná éHe was so short of sense as a child five years younger than him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ċoṁ gann i gcéill leis an leanḃ a ḃí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná éHe was so short of sense as a child five years younger than him.

result.eng: You could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ga: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.orig: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.html: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ċoṁ maiṫ a ḃeiṫ ag caint leis an ġealaċ le a ḃeiṫ ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.

result.eng: They started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ga: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.orig: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.html: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aigeThey started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ponchtml: Ṫoisiġ siad a ṁagaḋ ar Ṡeimí a rá leis gurb í a ḃeaḋ mar ṁnaoi aigeThey started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.

result.eng: Who did you pray for? Who are all the people you prayed for?
result.ga: Cé leis uilig ar chuir tú paidir
result.orig: Cé leis uilig ar chuir tú paidir
result.html: Cé leis uilig ar chuir tú paidirWho did you pray for? Who are all the people you prayed for?
result.ponchtml: Cé leis uilig ar ċuir tú paidirWho did you pray for? Who are all the people you prayed for?

result.eng: You're just like him!
result.ga: Tá tusa inchurtha leis féin
result.orig: Tá tusa inchurtha leis féin
result.html: Tá tusa inchurtha leis féinYou're just like him!
result.ponchtml: Tá tusa inċurṫa leis féinYou're just like him!

result.eng: He eyes were closing with sleep.
result.ga: Bhí na súile ag drud uirthi leis an chodladh
result.orig: Bhí na súile ag drud uirthi leis an chodladh
result.html: Bhí na súile ag drud uirthi leis an chodladhHe eyes were closing with sleep.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na súile ag drud uirṫi leis an ċodlaḋHe eyes were closing with sleep.

result.eng: Going to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
result.ga: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadh
result.orig: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadh
result.html: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadhGoing to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḋoiliġ a ġaḃáil ċun faoiside Ina ḋiaiḋ sin dar leis féin go gcaiṫfeaḋ sé an gealltanas a ċoṁlíonaḋGoing to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.

result.eng: There was no point in him opposing them.
result.ga: Ní raibh gar leis cur ina n-éadan
result.orig: Ní raibh gar leis cur ina n-éadan
result.html: Ní raibh gar leis cur ina n-éadanThere was no point in him opposing them.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ gar leis cur ina n-éadanThere was no point in him opposing them.

result.eng: He was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ga: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.orig: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.html: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé eadar ḋá ċóṁairle cé acu a ḃéarfaḋ sé leis an príosúnaċ nó a ligfeaḋ sé a ċeann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.

result.eng: He thought he should recognize his voice.
result.ga: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithne
result.orig: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithne
result.html: Dar leis gur cheart dó glór a chinn a aithneHe thought he should recognize his voice.
result.ponchtml: Dar leis gur ċeart dó glór a ċinn a aiṫneHe thought he should recognize his voice.

result.eng: He could not come home with empty pockets.
result.ga: Ní thiocfadh leis a ghabháil chun an bhaile ar phócaí folmha
result.orig: Ní thiocfadh leis a ghabháil chun an bhaile ar phócaí folmha
result.html: Ní thiocfadh leis a ghabháil chun an bhaile ar phócaí folmhaHe could not come home with empty pockets.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṫiocfaḋ leis a ġaḃáil ċun an ḃaile ar ṗócaí folṁaHe could not come home with empty pockets.

result.eng: He was walking heavily.
result.ga: Bhí coiscéim throm leis
result.orig: Bhí coiscéim throm leis
result.html: Bhí coiscéim throm leisHe was walking heavily.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí coiscéim ṫrom leisHe was walking heavily.

result.eng: He was wading through the snow.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag spágáil leis fríd an tsneachta
result.orig: Bhí sé ag spágáil leis fríd an tsneachta
result.html: Bhí sé ag spágáil leis fríd an tsneachtaHe was wading through the snow.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag spágáil leis fríd an tsneaċtaHe was wading through the snow.

result.eng: His pockets were bursting with gold.
result.ga: Bhí a phócaí ag brúchtaigh leis an ór
result.orig: Bhí a phócaí ag brúchtaigh leis an ór
result.html: Bhí a phócaí ag brúchtaigh leis an órHis pockets were bursting with gold.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ṗócaí ag brúċtaiġ leis an órHis pockets were bursting with gold.

result.eng: Tears came into his eyes.
result.ga: Tháinig na deora leis
result.orig: Tháinig na deora leis
result.html: Tháinig na deora leisTears came into his eyes.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig na deora leisTears came into his eyes.
